div.p: This value set does not contain a fixed number of concepts

An formalized inquiry into the circumstances surrounding a particular unplanned event or potential event for the purposes of identifying possible causes and contributing factors for the event. This investigation could be conducted at a local institutional level or at the level of a local or national government. (OID = 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20224)
This value set includes codes defined in other code systems, using the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ActClass where concept is-a INVSTG

description.value: An formalized inquiry into the circumstances surrounding a particular unplanned event or potential event for the purposes of identifying possible causes and contributing factors for the event. This investigation could be conducted at a local institutional level or at the level of a local or national government. (OID = 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20224)
